name: gov-radio-group
label: 单选组
codeSnap: <gov-radio-group value="{{[{name: '两字', value: 1}, {name: '五个字左右', value: 2}]}}"></gov-radio-group>

demoCode.s:
<view class="wrap">
    <view class="line">单选组 radio-group</view>
    <view class="line">行内单选 [inline=true]</view>
    <gov-radio-group
        options="{{group}}"
    >
    </gov-radio-group>
    <view class="line">禁用 [disable=true]</view>
    <gov-radio-group
        options="{{group2}}"
    >
    </gov-radio-group>
</view>

attributes.name: currentValue
attributes.description: 当前 options 选中状态值

attributes.name: activeInlineBgColor
attributes.description: 在inline-filter模式下选中时的背景颜色

events.name: click
events.description: 选中事件，返回当前单选框点击状态

events.name: change
events.description: 改变事件，返回当前单选组状态

externalClasses.name: gov-radio-group
externalClasses.description: 单选组的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变单选组的样式
